title: Device ban
text: I have never done anything wrong on this app. I simply logged out to go onto an old and unused account to get photos from my memories and I went to login to either my active or inactive account and I got the ‚Äúdevice ban‚Äù notification which I find to be completely unacceptable. I have been using Snapchat for almost 8 years now and I have NEVER had this issue before. I have never violated any of the Snapchat guidelines nor have I been hacked on my account. The fact that I cannot use the app on my device again is absurd. I pay for Snapchat+ and I follow all of the rules. I am unimpressed by the lack of customer support on your part. There is no reason to why I should be device banned not that there‚Äôs a reason given anyways. The fact that there‚Äôs no way to see why this has happened or a way to call and ask. Get it together.
